name: Baldur's Gate 3 Name Generator
description: Roll for initiative! Can't decide on the perfect moniker for your Tav, Durge, or hireling? Fear not, adventurer! Our Baldur's Gate 3 Name Generator is here to craft legendary names worthy of Faerûn's greatest heroes (and most cunning villains).
introduction: Embark on your epic journey with a name that resonates with power, mystery, and maybe a little bit of Illithid influence. Whether you're a noble Paladin, a mischievous Rogue, or a power-hungry Sorcerer, we've got the perfect name waiting to be discovered. Prepare to be amazed... or at least mildly amused!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold! A name, forged in the fires of Mount Celestia (or maybe just our servers), will appear.
Don't like what you see? Click again! We've got more names than a goblin has stolen socks.
Feeling fancy? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create a truly unique and unforgettable name.
Once you've found the perfect name, copy it and paste it into Baldur's Gate 3. Congratulations, you're now ready to save (or conquer) Faerûn!

faqs.question: Is this generator truly random?
faqs.answer: As random as a dice roll blessed by Tymora herself! We use a sophisticated algorithm (and a healthy dose of chaos) to ensure each name is unique and unpredictable.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other games or stories?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! These names are perfect for any fantasy setting. Go forth and spread the legend!

faqs.question: Will this generator help me become a better Baldur's Gate 3 player?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee you'll defeat the Absolute, a cool name is definitely a step in the right direction. Look good, play good, right?

faqs.question: Are the names lore-friendly?
faqs.answer: They're inspired by the rich tapestry of Faerûn, but with a sprinkle of our own magical seasoning. Some names might sound familiar, others might be completely new. Consider them lore-adjacent!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! Or, you know, come up with your own. But where's the fun in that? We promise, eventually, the algorithm will bless you with a name you adore.

faqs.question: Is this generator endorsed by Larian Studios?
faqs.answer: While we'd love to say yes, we're just enthusiastic fans. Consider this our humble tribute to the incredible world of Baldur's Gate 3.
